game.name: CarRace
game.description:
It is always very exciting and amazing to drive a car through multiple obstacles and win a race! Today we have brought to you a brand new racing challenge where you have to move a car left and right to complete all levels. Do you want to try it out this amazing car driving fun challenge? Join Car Race game and be prepared to guide your vehicle to pass through the fixed number of hurdles to move to the next level!

You can move to the advanced level only if you complete the present level. Move through the open path and grab hearts while avoiding damage to your vehicle to score high in the end of this cool HTML5 car game! Track how many lives are left at your side by looking at the top left corner of the screen! The middle portion of the screen will show you how many obstacles you have passed through and how much is left to be cleared.

There are many unique and challenging levels to play through and you only need to concentrate on the screen and put your driving and avoiding abilities to complete all levels. Click the setting button shown on the top right corner of the screen to explore the options including toggle sound, toggle music, privacy policy, get for android, and credits! You can track your score by looking at the top left corner of the screen. Good luck to try out more car racing games and have fun without download!
